alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 6:23PM CDT until July 17 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Jefferson County in east central Missouri... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 623 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hillsboro, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Festus, De Soto, Pevely, Crystal City, Herculaneum, Hillsboro, Barnhart, Olympian Village, Cedar Hill Lakes, Dittmer, Horine, Hematite, Victoria, Morse Mill, Oermann, Fletcher, Mapaville, and Grubville. This includes Interstate 55 in Missouri between exits 170 and 180. This also includes Sandy Creek Covered Bridge Historic Site and Gov. Dunklin`s Grave Historic Site. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
